channel.title: Flutracking on My Honours Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Flutracking on My Honours Blog

item.title: Chow’s Test
item.description: One of the goals of my project is to try and identify changes in the structure of the various flutracking time series (initially the % of unvaccinated respondents reporting ILI symptoms). There are two reasons for this that inspire two separate lines of inquiry: does the structure change from year to year; and does the structure change within each year? Here we will be using Chow’s test to test for structural breaks in the flutracking data.

item.title: Summary of available time series
item.description: A brief summary of all of the available datasets within the publically available Flutracking reports. The data itself will be accessible on another page. This is still just a test.
